fullText: This gender-flipped revival of Stephen Sondheim's Company feels both timely and timeless, with Katrina Lenk delivering a powerhouse performance as Bobbie.
dtliExcerpt: This gender-flipped revival of Stephen Sondheim's Company feels both timely and timeless, with Katrina Lenk delivering a powerhouse performance as Bobbie.
